page.title: 02EAST ALLINGTON FARMS
page.content: OUR SCHOOL VISITED 22 FARMS IN OUR AREA. ONLY TWO FARMS HAD MANAGERS, ONE HAD A TENANT, THE REST WERE ALL OWNERS. ACREAGES RANGE FROM 52 ACRES FOR THE SMALLEST FARM TO 400 ACRES FOR THE LARGEST. 27% OF THESE FARMS WERE BETWEEN 50 TO 100 ACRES 51% BETWEEN 100 TO 150 ACRES,4% BETWEEN 150 TO 200 ACRES,14% BETWEEN 200 TO 300 ACRES AND ONLY 4% OVER 300 ACRES.THE WEEKLY HOURS ON AVERAGE WORKED ON THE FARMS WERE VERY LONG. ONLY 5% WORKED UNDER 40 HOURS,36% WORKED BETWEEN 5O TO 60 HOURS 9% 60 TO 70 HOURS,9% 70 TO 80 HOURS AND 41% OVER 80 HOURS PER WEEK.HOLIDAY HABBITS VARY.36% SAID THEY NEVER HAVE ONE,10% EVERY 5 YEARS, 9% EVERY 2 YEARS AND 45% EVERY YEAR WITH ONLY 18% TAKING A REGULAR DAY OFF EACH WEEK.
